name: Niv-Mizzet, the Firemind
text: Flying\nWhenever you draw a card, Niv-Mizzet, the Firemind deals 1 damage to target creature or player.\n{T}: Draw a card.

name: Kiln Fiend
text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Kiln Fiend gets +3/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: It traps an explosion within its stony skin.

name: Goblin Electromancer
text: Instant and sorcery spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
flavor: When asked how much power is required, Izzet mages always answer "more."

name: Izzet Guildmage
text: ({U/R} can be paid with either {U} or {R}.)\n{2}{U}: Copy target instant spell you control with converted mana cost 2 or less. You may choose new targets for the copy.\n{2}{R}: Copy target sorcery spell you control with converted mana cost 2 or less. You may choose new targets for the copy.

name: Gelectrode
text: {T}: Gelectrode deals 1 damage to target creature or player.\nWhenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may untap Gelectrode.
flavor: "Diametrically opposing energies in self-sealed plasmodermic bubbles make great pets!"\n—Trivaz, Izzet mage

name: Wee Dragonauts
text: Flying\nWhenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Wee Dragonauts gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: "The blazekite is a simple concept, really—just a vehicular application of dragscoop ionics and electropropulsion magnetronics."\n—Juzba, Izzet tinker

name: Steamcore Weird
text: When Steamcore Weird enters the battlefield, if {R} was spent to cast Steamcore Weird, it deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
flavor: Like many Izzet creations, weirds are based on wild contradictions yet somehow manage to work.

name: Shrewd Hatchling
text:
Shrewd Hatchling enters the battlefield with four -1/-1 counters on it.
{U/R}: Target creature can't block Shrewd Hatchling this turn.
Whenever you cast a blue spell, remove a -1/-1 counter from Shrewd Hatchling.
Whenever you cast a red spell, remove a -1/-1 counter from Shrewd Hatchling.

name: Ogre Savant
text: When Ogre Savant enters the battlefield, if {U} was spent to cast Ogre Savant, return target creature to its owner's hand.
flavor: He's an oxymoron.

name: Galvanoth
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may look at the top card of your library. If it's an instant or sorcery card, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.
flavor: It chews open Mirrodin's husk and feeds on the outpouring of energy.

name: Izzet Chronarch
text: When Izzet Chronarch enters the battlefield, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor: He ensures not only whether but also when and where the lightning strikes twice.

name: Djinn Illuminatus
text: ({U/R} can be paid with either {U} or {R}.)\nFlying\nEach instant and sorcery spell you cast has replicate. The replicate cost is equal to its mana cost. (When you cast it, copy it for each time you paid its replicate cost. You may choose new targets for the copies.)

name: Brainstorm
text: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.
flavor: The mizzium-sphere array drove her mind deep into the thought field, where only the rarest motes of genius may be plucked.

name: Force Spike
text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}.
flavor: "I don't think so."

name: Magma Spray
text: Magma Spray deals 2 damage to target creature. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.
flavor: "Jund is a wounded world. Beware its searing blood spilling out onto the surface."\n—Rakka Mar

name: Isochron Scepter
text: Imprint — When Isochron Scepter enters the battlefield, you may exile an instant card with converted mana cost 2 or less from your hand.\n{2}, {T}: You may copy the exiled card. If you do, you may cast the copy without paying its mana cost.

name: Izzet Signet
text: {1}, {T}: Add {U}{R} to your mana pool.
flavor: The Izzet signet is redesigned often, each time becoming closer to a vanity portrait of Niv-Mizzet.

name: Call to Heel
text: Return target creature to its owner's hand. Its controller draws a card.
flavor: On Bant, a sigil is both a prize of honor and a bond of duty. The one who bears it may be called to fulfill that charge at any moment.

name: Train of Thought
text: Replicate {1}{U} (When you cast this spell, copy it for each time you paid its replicate cost.)\nDraw a card.
flavor: "But then . . . oh, but . . . which means . . . which would lead to . . . exactly!"

name: Pyromatics
text: Replicate {1}{R} (When you cast this spell, copy it for each time you paid its replicate cost. You may choose new targets for the copies.)\nPyromatics deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

name: Izzet Charm
text:
Choose one —
• Counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays {2}.
• Izzet Charm deals 2 damage to target creature.
• Draw two cards, then discard two cards.

name: Reminisce
text: Target player shuffles his or her graveyard into his or her library.
flavor: Leave the door to the past even slightly ajar and it could be blown off its hinges.

name: Thunderheads
text: Replicate {2}{U} (When you cast this spell, copy it for each time you paid its replicate cost.)\nPut a 3/3 blue Weird creature token with defender and flying onto the battlefield. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.
flavor: The clouds grew thick, and then they grew teeth.

name: Vacuumelt
text: Replicate {2}{U} (When you cast this spell, copy it for each time you paid its replicate cost. You may choose new targets for the copies.)\nReturn target creature to its owner's hand.

name: Dissipate
text: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard.
flavor: "This abomination never belonged in our world. I'm merely setting it free."\n—Dierk, geistmage

name: Quicksilver Dagger
text: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature has "{T}: This creature deals 1 damage to target player. You draw a card."
flavor: The dwarves call their quicksilver techniques "improvisational weaponsmithing."

name: Prophetic Bolt
text: Prophetic Bolt deals 4 damage to target creature or player. Look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of those cards into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

name: Overwhelming Intellect
text: Counter target creature spell. Draw cards equal to that spell's converted mana cost.
flavor: "My brain hurts."

name: Sphinx-Bone Wand
text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may put a charge counter on Sphinx-Bone Wand. If you do, Sphinx-Bone Wand deals damage equal to the number of charge counters on it to target creature or player.
flavor: Its host's final curse lies captured within.

name: Street Spasm
text: Street Spasm deals X damage to target creature without flying you don't control.\nOverload {X}{X}{R}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")

name: Invoke the Firemind
text: Choose one —\n• Draw X cards.\n• Invoke the Firemind deals X damage to target creature or player.
flavor: To those in tune with the Firemind, there is no difference between knowledge and flame.

name: Fire
text: Fire deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two target creatures and/or players.

name: Ice
text: Tap target permanent.\nDraw a card.

name: Forgotten Cave
text: Forgotten Cave enters the battlefield tapped.\n{T}: Add {R} to your mana pool.\nCycling {R} ({R}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

name: Izzet Boilerworks
text: Izzet Boilerworks enters the battlefield tapped.\nWhen Izzet Boilerworks enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand.\n{T}: Add {U}{R} to your mana pool.

name: Lonely Sandbar
text: Lonely Sandbar enters the battlefield tapped.\n{T}: Add {U} to your mana pool.\nCycling {U} ({U}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

name: Nivix, Aerie of the Firemind
text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.\n{2}{U}{R}, {T}: Exile the top card of your library. Until your next turn, you may cast that card if it's an instant or sorcery.
flavor: Niv-Mizzet's genius and vanity reverberate throughout the mirrored halls of Nivix.

name: Jarad, Golgari Lich Lord
text: Jarad, Golgari Lich Lord gets +1/+1 for each creature card in your graveyard.\n{1}{B}{G}, Sacrifice another creature: Each opponent loses life equal to the sacrificed creature's power.\nSacrifice a Swamp and a Forest: Return Jarad from your graveyard to your hand.

name: Plagued Rusalka
text: {B}, Sacrifice a creature: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor: "Look at her, once filled with innocence. Death has a way of wringing away such . . . deficiencies."\n—Savra

name: Elves of Deep Shadow
text: {T}: Add {B} to your mana pool. Elves of Deep Shadow deals 1 damage to you.
flavor: Cast out of the Conclave generations ago, these elves found a home in the corrupted districts of the Golgari.

name: Golgari Thug
text: When Golgari Thug dies, put target creature card from your graveyard on top of your library.\nDredge 4 (If you would draw a card, instead you may put exactly four cards from the top of your library into your graveyard. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, draw a card.)

name: Ravenous Rats
text: When Ravenous Rats enters the battlefield, target opponent discards a card.
flavor: Devouring books is only the beginning. The librarian's next.

name: Reassembling Skeleton
text: {1}{B}: Return Reassembling Skeleton from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.
flavor: "They may show up with the wrong thigh bone or mandible, but they always show up."\n—Zul Ashur, lich lord

name: Boneyard Wurm
text: Boneyard Wurm's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creature cards in your graveyard.
flavor: The only thing it likes more than discovering a pit of bones is adding to it.

name: Korozda Guildmage
text: {1}{B}{G}: Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains intimidate until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)\n{2}{B}{G}, Sacrifice a nontoken creature: Put X 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens onto the battlefield, where X is the sacrificed creature's toughness.

name: Putrid Leech
text: Pay 2 life: Putrid Leech gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.
flavor: It reacted to Naya's overabundant food supply by growing additional mouths.

name: Stinkweed Imp
text: Flying\nWhenever Stinkweed Imp deals combat damage to a creature, destroy that creature.\nDredge 5 (If you would draw a card, instead you may put exactly five cards from the top of your library into your graveyard. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, draw a card.)

name: Eternal Witness
text: When Eternal Witness enters the battlefield, you may return target card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor: She remembers every word spoken, from the hero's oath to the baby's cry.

name: Dreg Mangler
text: Haste\nScavenge {3}{B}{G} ({3}{B}{G}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a number of +1/+1 counters equal to this card's power on target creature. Scavenge only as a sorcery.)

name: Shambling Shell
text: Sacrifice Shambling Shell: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.\nDredge 3 (If you would draw a card, instead you may put exactly three cards from the top of your library into your graveyard. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, draw a card.)

name: Brain Weevil
text: Intimidate (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)\nSacrifice Brain Weevil: Target player discards two cards. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

name: Greater Mossdog
text: Dredge 3 (If you would draw a card, instead you may put exactly three cards from the top of your library into your graveyard. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, draw a card.)
flavor: Man's best fungus.

name: Golgari Grave-Troll
text: Golgari Grave-Troll enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each creature card in your graveyard.\n{1}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Golgari Grave-Troll: Regenerate Golgari Grave-Troll.\nDredge 6 (If you would draw a card, instead you may put exactly six cards from the top of your library into your graveyard. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, draw a card.)

name: Stingerfling Spider
text: Reach\nWhen Stingerfling Spider enters the battlefield, you may destroy target creature with flying.
flavor: The juiciest prey is that which grows lazy, thinking itself beyond the reach of danger.

name: Sadistic Hypnotist
text: Sacrifice a creature: Target player discards two cards. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.
flavor: "Victory in the pits is almost as rewarding as the methods I use to achieve it."

name: Golgari Rotwurm
text: {B}, Sacrifice a creature: Target player loses 1 life.
flavor: Like corpse-worms through a carapace, rotwurms slide through the hollowed bones of the undercity.

name: Gleancrawler
text: ({B/G} can be paid with either {B} or {G}.)\nTrample\nAt the beginning of your end step, return to your hand all creature cards in your graveyard that were put there from the battlefield this turn.

name: Doomgape
text: Trample\nAt the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a creature. You gain life equal to that creature's toughness.
flavor: It eats and eats until the juiciest morsel it can find is itself.

name: Golgari Signet
text: {1}, {T}: Add {B}{G} to your mana pool.
flavor: Depending on your point of view, the seal represents a proud guardian of the natural cycle or one who has sold her soul to darkness for eternal life.

name: Ghoul's Feast
text: Target creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of creature cards in your graveyard.
flavor: Mercadians not wealthy enough to buy a tomb are thrown into a bog called "the Ghoul's Larder."

name: Yoke of the Damned
text: Enchant creature\nWhen a creature dies, destroy enchanted creature.
flavor: The demon's yoke is part leash, part noose.

name: Life from the Loam
text: Return up to three target land cards from your graveyard to your hand.\nDredge 3 (If you would draw a card, instead you may put exactly three cards from the top of your library into your graveyard. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, draw a card.)

name: Golgari Germination
text: Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token onto the battlefield.
flavor: The Golgari don't bury their dead. They plant them.

name: Putrefy
text: Destroy target artifact or creature. It can't be regenerated.
flavor: "All matter, animate or not, rots when exposed to time. We merely speed up the process."\n—Ezoc, Golgari rot farmer

name: Feast or Famine
text: Choose one —\n• Put a 2/2 black Zombie creature token onto the battlefield.\n• Destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.
flavor: "The living cannot understand the benefits of death."\n—Chaeska, Keeper of Tresserhorn

name: Nightmare Void
text: Target player reveals his or her hand. You choose a card from it. That player discards that card.\nDredge 2 (If you would draw a card, instead you may put exactly two cards from the top of your library into your graveyard. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, draw a card.)

name: Vigor Mortis
text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. If {G} was spent to cast Vigor Mortis, that creature enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.
flavor: After fear and weakness rot away, that which remains is stronger than its living form.

name: Grim Flowering
text: Draw a card for each creature card in your graveyard.
flavor: "Nothing in nature goes to waste, not even the rotting corpse of a good-for-nothing, blood-sucking vampire."\n—Halana of Ulvenwald

name: Twilight's Call
text: You may cast Twilight's Call as though it had flash if you pay {2} more to cast it. (You may cast it any time you could cast an instant.)\nEach player returns all creature cards from his or her graveyard to the battlefield.
flavor: Twilight falls. We rise.\n—Necropolis inscription

name: Life
text: All lands you control become 1/1 creatures until end of turn. They're still lands.

name: Death
text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. You lose life equal to its converted mana cost.

name: Barren Moor
text: Barren Moor enters the battlefield tapped.\n{T}: Add {B} to your mana pool.\nCycling {B} ({B}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

name: Dakmor Salvage
text: Dakmor Salvage enters the battlefield tapped.\n{T}: Add {B} to your mana pool.\nDredge 2 (If you would draw a card, instead you may put exactly two cards from the top of your library into your graveyard. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, draw a card.)

name: Golgari Rot Farm
text: Golgari Rot Farm enters the battlefield tapped.\nWhen Golgari Rot Farm enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand.\n{T}: Add {B}{G} to your mana pool.

name: Svogthos, the Restless Tomb
text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.\n{3}{B}{G}: Until end of turn, Svogthos, the Restless Tomb becomes a black and green Plant Zombie creature with "This creature's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creature cards in your graveyard." It's still a land.

name: Tranquil Thicket
text: Tranquil Thicket enters the battlefield tapped.\n{T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.\nCycling {G} ({G}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
